meanings.definition: A type of fungus that reproduces by spores.
meanings.sent1: The phycomycete released spores into the air for reproduction.
meanings.sent2: I found a phycomycete growing on the damp forest floor.
meanings.sent3: The phycomycete decided to throw a spore party to celebrate its reproduction.
meanings.sent4: The phycomycete scattered spores like confetti, celebrating its ability to reproduce.
meanings.sent5: The phycomycete's spore reproduction was like a fireworks display in the forest.

meanings.definition: A member of the class Phycomycetes.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied a phycomycete under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Many phycomycetes can be found in damp environments.
meanings.sent3: The phycomycete in the lab told jokes to the other fungi, trying to be the class clown.
meanings.sent4: The phycomycete stood out in the class like a bright star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The phycomycete's presence in the class was as noticeable as a peacock in a flock of pigeons.
